text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LG41762-2SocialDeterminantsOfHealth
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category

name: USCoreObservationCategory
title: US Core Observation Category Codes
description: HL7 FHIR concepts to classify an observation
